categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Handree was a DP20 frigate that was in operation with the Rebel Alliance some time during the Galactic Civil War.

The vessel was stationed on Isis and supplied medicalstuffs to guerrilla rebels on Polmanar. The Imperial survey crew of the Wanderer hijacked the vessel, transporting it to Bespin. Alliance operatives recaptured the ship before the Isis location could be exposed.
